explanation: In order to complete the task of placing chilled bread to the right of apple on a white dining table, the objects involved would be the chilled bread, apple, and white dining table. Other objects in the environment such as butterknife, pot, spoon, spatula, egg, soapbottle, tomato, bowl, saltshaker, pepper shaker, lettuce, knife, fork, kettle, cup, paper towel roll, dish sponge, mug do not play a role in completing this specific task.
